inputs.content:
<input type="text" 
                               class="form-control form-control-lg" 
                               id="name" 
                               name="name" 
                               required 
                               placeholder="Enter mentor's full name"
                               autocomplete="name"
                               pattern="[A-Za-z\s]{2,50}"
                               title="Name should contain only letters and spaces (2-50 characters)">

<input type="text" 
                                   class="form-control form-control-lg" 
                                   id="roll_call" 
                                   name="roll_call" 
                                   required 
                                   placeholder="e.g., MENT001, T123456"
                                   autocomplete="username"
                                   pattern="[A-Za-z0-9]{3,20}"
                                   title="Staff ID should be 3-20 characters (letters and numbers only)">

<input type="range" 
                                   class="form-range me-3" 
                                   id="max_mentees_slider" 
                                   min="1" 
                                   max="15" 
                                   value="5"
                                   style="flex: 1;">

<input type="number" 
                                   class="form-control text-center fw-bold" 
                                   id="max_mentees" 
                                   name="max_mentees" 
                                   value="5" 
                                   min="1" 
                                   max="15" 
                                   required
                                   style="width: 80px;">

<input type="text" 
                               class="form-control form-control-lg" 
                               id="name" 
                               name="name" 
                               required 
                               placeholder="Enter student's full name"
                               autocomplete="name"
                               pattern="[A-Za-z\s]{2,50}"
                               title="Name should contain only letters and spaces (2-50 characters)">

<input type="text" 
                                   class="form-control form-control-lg" 
                                   id="roll_call" 
                                   name="roll_call" 
                                   required 
                                   placeholder="e.g., 12/7, 11/2, 9A, 8B, 12ENG1"
                                   autocomplete="off"
                                   pattern="(1[0-2]\/[1-9]|[7-9][A-Za-z]|1[0-2][A-Z]{2,4}[1-9])"
                                   title="Years 10-12: format like 12/7, 11/2. Years 7-9: format like 9A, 8B. Subject codes: 12ENG1, 11MAT2"
                                   style="text-transform: uppercase;">

<input type="text" 
                                   class="form-control form-control-lg" 
                                   id="subject-search" 
                                   placeholder="Search for a subject..."
                                   autocomplete="off">

<input type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" id="currentSessionSearch" 
                               placeholder="Search current sessions..." style="width: 220px;">

<input type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" id="pastSessionSearch" 
                               placeholder="Search past sessions..." style="width: 180px;">

<input type="text" 
                                           class="form-control" 
                                           id="confirmation-text" 
                                           placeholder="Type exactly: DELETE ALL DATA"
                                           required>

<input type="text" 
                                       class="form-control" 
                                       id="first_name" 
                                       name="first_name" 
                                       required 
                                       placeholder="Enter first name"
                                       autocomplete="given-name"
                                       pattern="[A-Za-z\s]{2,25}"
                                       title="First name should contain only letters (2-25 characters)">

<input type="text" 
                                       class="form-control" 
                                       id="last_name" 
                                       name="last_name" 
                                       required 
                                       placeholder="Enter last name"
                                       autocomplete="family-name"
                                       pattern="[A-Za-z\s]{2,25}"
                                       title="Last name should contain only letters (2-25 characters)">

<input type="text" 
                                           class="form-control" 
                                           id="roll_call" 
                                           name="roll_call" 
                                           required 
                                           placeholder="e.g., 12/7, 11/2, 9A, 8B, 12ENG1"
                                           autocomplete="off"
                                           pattern="(1[0-2]\/[1-9]|[7-9][A-Za-z]|1[0-2][A-Z]{2,4}[1-9])"
                                           title="Years 10-12: format like 12/7, 11/2. Years 7-9: format like 9A, 8B. Subject codes: 12ENG1, 11MAT2"
                                           style="text-transform: uppercase;">

<input type="text" 
                                           class="form-control" 
                                           id="subjects-search" 
                                           placeholder="Search for subjects to add..."
                                           autocomplete="off">

<input type="range" 
                                           class="form-range me-3" 
                                           id="max_mentees_slider" 
                                           min="1" 
                                           max="15" 
                                           value="5"
                                           style="flex: 1;">

<input type="number" 
                                           class="form-control text-center fw-bold" 
                                           id="max_mentees" 
                                           name="max_mentees" 
                                           value="5" 
                                           min="1" 
                                           max="15" 
                                           required
                                           style="width: 80px;">
<input type="text" class="form-control" id="mentorSearch" placeholder="Search mentors by name or roll call...">
<input type="text" class="form-control" id="subjectFilter" placeholder="Search subjects..." autocomplete="off">
